getEnrolledUserList

public java.util.List<blackboard.data.user.User> getEnrolledUserList()
                                                              throws blackboard.persist.KeyNotFoundException,
                                                                     blackboard.persist.PersistenceException
Method gets a list of enrolled users in a course. This is used by the instructor in the grades page. Includes students, admins, instructors, TA's.

Returns:
the enrolledUserList - List of enrolled users
Throws:
blackboard.persist.PersistenceException
blackboard.persist.KeyNotFoundException

getCourseInstructor

public boolean getCourseInstructor()
Returns whether the user is in instructor mode or not. Currently checks an entitlement - COURSE_CONTROL_PANEL_VIEW which is usually available for instructors / TA in blackboard. Might need to change in the future according to the Blackboard changes.

Returns:
the courseInstructor

setAssignmentInfo

public void setAssignmentInfo(AssignmentInfo assignmentInfo)
Method which sets the AssignmentInfo Object. Usually this occurs in the loginwebwork.jsp or grades.jsp page. As AssignmentInfo is the only object which has the gradebookname, assignment name etc, it has to be attached as an object to be written to the blackboard Db for each user.

Parameters:
assignmentInfo - the assignmentInfo to set

getAssignmentInfo

public AssignmentInfo getAssignmentInfo()
Method which gets the AssignmentInfo Object. See setAssignmentInfo method for details.

Returns:
the assignmentInfo

getCourseIdentity

public blackboard.persist.Id getCourseIdentity()
Method returns the Id of the course that the user is in currently. This is mostly required to redirect / writing grades / publishing announcement etc. this is required for both students as well as instructors in blackboard. This is being generated from courseNumber captured from the request params which is detailed in setCourseNumber method Doc.

Returns:
the courseIdentity

Method sets the courseId to an Id object. See getCourseIdentity method for proper details.

Parameters:
courseIdentity - the courseIdentity to set

getCourseContentsUrl

public java.lang.String getCourseContentsUrl()
Method sets the course contents url variable to the course and the content return url of the blackboard. If both these numbers - course and content is not available then, an empty string is set as the url. Beware of this in the frontend pages. Usually used in redirections inside the plugin.

Returns:
the courseContentsUrl

setWriteGrades

public void setWriteGrades(boolean writeGrades)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                           blackboard.data.ValidationException
Calls the generic method persistGradesToBlackboard which does the functionality. Usually this method is called from loginwebwork.jsp by a student to set his own grade. Thus, the Id of the student and his name is passed to the generic method to write the grades.

Parameters:
writeGrades - the writeGrades to set
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
blackboard.data.ValidationException

setStudentsGrades

public void setStudentsGrades(boolean studentsGrades)
                       throws blackboard.persist.KeyNotFoundException,
                              blackboard.persist.PersistenceException
Method sets the student grades. Usually called from an instructor context. Right now only used in grades.jsp. Calls the generic method persistGradesToBlackboard which does the functionality. Here the list of enrolled users are fetched for the course, and then only student users of the course are captured and sent to the generic method. This is to prevent instructors / TA / Admin to be excluded from the grades.

Parameters:
studentsGrades - boolean to indicate whether to get student grades and write them.
Throws:
blackboard.persist.PersistenceException
blackboard.persist.KeyNotFoundException

persistGradesToBlackboard

private boolean persistGradesToBlackboard(java.util.List<blackboard.persist.Id> userIdList,
                                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> userNameList)
Method which writes the grades to the Blackboard grades. First tries to load the score available in the gradebook center, if not creates a new score. Also the gradebookname is captured in the request param for each assignment. The grades are captured from the webwork Db using grade_user_sets webservice function. (If the function name / parameter changes change the details in this method too for proper functioning.) Sets the return boolean value to success of the method function.

Parameters:
userIdList - - List of user Id's to load the score info.
userName - - List of user name's in blackboard to load and set score.
Returns:
whether all data written successfully or not.

getWriteGrades

public boolean getWriteGrades()
Method returns the boolean varibale to check if the student grade is written to the Blackboard. Based on this value, accordingly, the student are given proper information.

Returns:
the writeGrades

getStudentsGrades

public boolean getStudentsGrades()
Method returns the boolean variable to check whether student grades are written successfully or not. This is the value returned from the generic method persistGradesToBlackboard.

Returns:
the studentsGrades

setStudentsGradesScores

public void setStudentsGradesScores(java.lang.String[] studentsGradesScores)
Method sets the student grades to an array of string containing the grades from the blackboard Db.

Parameters:
studentsGradesScores - the studentsGradesScores to set

getStudentsGradesScores

public java.lang.String[] getStudentsGradesScores()
Method returns the list of student grades. This is the value of the blackboard grades, after writing the grades from webwork. This might not return some grades, when there were exceptions. Usually this is not the case.

Returns:
the studentsGradesScores

setPublishAssignmentsData

public void setPublishAssignmentsData(boolean publishAssignmentsData)
                               throws blackboard.persist.PersistenceException,
                                      blackboard.data.ValidationException,
                                      java.text.ParseException
This method adds the current new assignment to the grade book. Returns false if one of the records successfully not added. Returns true if all assignments selected in assignments.jsp are successfully added. Also if grade book addition is success the content item is also added into Blackboard DB. This is the main method which writes data presented in the assignments.jsp page to blackboard. Annoucement, tracking information etc. all are set in this method. Comments should clarify other required details.

Parameters:
publishAssignmentsData - the publishAssignmentsData to set
Throws:
blackboard.persist.PersistenceException
blackboard.data.ValidationException
java.text.ParseException

getPublishAssignmentsData

public boolean getPublishAssignmentsData()
Method returns the boolean value which signifies whether all data are published successfully or not. See the get method for more details.

Returns:
the publishAssignmentsData

writeWebworkChanges

public boolean writeWebworkChanges()
Method write changes to wrbwork server. Any change in the start date of the assignment, end date of the assignment, partial credit enabling, this is written over to the webwork.
